title: I love the new Winter Skins! But...
body:
Don't Syndra's upper arms look a tad bit too skinny? Just seems a tiny bit off. I like her coat and the vfx look great. The rest of her is fine. But... her upper arms just look like pringles cans...

Maybe that's just me.

Bard tho. Those heals. Oh my.

EDIT: Yeah, I looked at each of her other skins and the base. Other than the base and justicar, her upper arms have a little bit more to them. I don't mean to pick out flaws, I love the work the folks are Riot do. But, it's just... she's wearing a coat and... her arms... skinny as pringles cans in this skin...
But seriously, that's my only nitpick. These are some awesome skins and I can't wait to see the splash arts.

replies.body:
Hey Voidac,

Thanks for the feedback! We made some adjustments to the arms today, so you'll see changes on PBE with the next update. ^-^
Awesome, thanks for the update!

No problem! 

S@20 posted a good comparison shot - http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JAbkr0ZXaW4/Vl4SYo8YYYI/AAAAAAAAJNE/-fz80l0cla4/s1600/syndracompare2.jpg

Yup, I saw it. I'm so glad! Honestly I feel it makes the skin that much better. It looks more like an actual Winter coat now. 
Thank you and the other talented people at Riot! 



(And now begins my wait for another Brand skin... because honestly, Spirit Fire is so damn cool.)

I agree! I think it's something we (the team) may have overlooked 'cause we'd been working on her so long. This is why some fresh eyes is always a good call (PBE, etc). Thanks for the awesome feedback! 

[Brand intensifies]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3HBwQl9eggs

Thanks for passing that along, Katey!

I can't wait for this Syndra skin, and now her arms look great! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Any time! ^-^

Hey Katey! 
Is it possible to turn Syndra's eyes blue both on splash and in game? Folks already complain she looks stoned.

We don't have plans to adjust the eyes. 

For a bit of context here - we did consider other colors for her eyes. The idea behind this skin is for her to be Syndra dressed in snow gear, ready to go out and play, which is why she has her base eye color.

In addition, we didn't change her VO, so we felt her having normal colored eyes wouldn't fit with the personality she has. We wanted the hint of evil to still come through in the skin.
To be honest, I'd rather she'd wear googles or something because her face looks ***GOD AWFUL*** in the splash art, due to her eyes...

most people don't put on colored contacts when they play in the snow XD

Tbh I like how she looks, but that might just be because I like purple eyes.

Oh no, don't get me wrong. I LOVE purple (even wish I had purple eyes), but they just look so off with the splash art. Although when I look at it more, there's more detail to Gnar's face, and Bard in general, than in Syndra's face.
I agree on her not having much detail, I think she should be much more in focus, hopefully her loading screen cut focuses her in a bit more.
The entire eye is purple... There is a difference xD
not if you zoom in. Kind of why I wish she had a better focus in the splash, her face has low resolution.
Talking about the splash, sorry if I implied anything different :p

I'm also talking about the splash. The resolution is absolutely terrible on Syndra's part of the splash. It's why her features don't look very good. They should've had two seprerate images if shes gonna be in the back ground, one high res for her loading splash and the normal one with Bard and Gnar for the shared splash.

I understand the intent which I honestly like, but the eye color she has right now does not resemble or hint at any evilness she has. I believe that she would only need a small color tweak, a tad darker purple plus tweaking the iris into white, like the classic splash has it (if I am not completely mistaken here). 

I really love what you guys do and you made my christmas perfect by creating Snow Day Syndra, for my favourite champion. I can only secretly hope that you folks at riot -may- consider tweaking the eyes a tad~
I believe from what RiotKateyKhaos has said is that the reason they look smaller is because she doesn't have any armor on her upper arms, unlike the other skins
I know, but even with Queen and Altantian, the armor curves to the shape of her arm. Hell, Queen doesn't even have armor and it's still better in this aspect.

Quinn is a soldier, scouting in the wilds, with giant eagle frequently catching her by the arms.

I'd say it makes sense for her to be more muscular.

I think it would be a funny twist, actually, if it turned out that Syndra is so absurdly powerful she doesn't even need to walk on ground, but lack of proper muscle training has made her body frail. 

Cue noodle hands.
